name: ZJ van de Weg
title: CEO
bio: ZJ is the CEO of FlowFuse. As an engineer-turned-CEO with a career built on open-source software, his mission is to empower engineers to build better, more efficient software solutions.
facts: Early GitLab employee, still knows too much about Git for his own good
BSc in Computer Science, developing software since his teenage years
Only half an Ironman, but certainly knows how to swim, bike, and run
